sections.title: Lantern Bearer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Lantern Bearer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Lantern Arcana (Sp) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Grants a series of spell-like abilities with uses per day scaling with class level, including light-based spells, darkvision, and protection effects. Caster level equals character level and save DCs are Intelligence-based.

sections.title: Luminous Potency (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Adds Lantern Bearer class level as a bonus to caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance when casting spells from other classes or using lantern arcana abilities.

sections.title: Bitter Armament (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Metal weapons wielded by the Lantern Bearer are treated as cold iron for overcoming damage reduction, retaining this property for 1 round after leaving her grasp.

sections.title: Favored Enemy (Ex) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Functions like the ranger favored enemy ability, selecting from specific creature types and stacking with other classes that grant favored enemy. Gains additional selection and bonus increase at 8th level.

sections.title: Superior Discernment (Ex) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Grants one of three specific bonus feats (Eagle Eyes, Elven Accuracy, or Sharp Senses) even without meeting prerequisites.

sections.title: Unbounded Stride (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: As a swift action, grants immunity to movement-impairing effects including magical areas, entanglement, and difficult terrain for a limited number of rounds per day equal to class level.

sections.title: Proven Weapon Familiarity (Ex) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Provides a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with specific elven weapons including bows, swords, and any weapon with 'elven' in its name.

sections.title: Celestial Weaponry (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: All attacks made by the Lantern Bearer are treated as good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

sections.title: Fade from Sight (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Allows use of Stealth without cover or concealment and even while being observed, activated as a swift action for a limited number of rounds per day equal to class level.

sections.title: Gatewalk (Su) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Grants teleportation to studied elf gates once per day as a full-round action, plus dimension door-like movement twice per day as a swift action with 50-foot range.

sections.title: Bringer of Brightness (Sp) (Lantern Bearer)
sections.description: Once per day, engulfs the Lantern Bearer in brilliant radiance functioning as a holy aura spell targeting only herself.
